verses.1: “Ngasa siahna sikkawi tawh Awle man zo dinga, khauhual khat tawh a leii hen zo ding na hi hiam?
verses.2: A nakpheh ah khau vawh zo dinga, a khaguh ah sikkawi bulh zo ding na hiam?
verses.3: Amah in na khah nading hong thum dinga, na hehpih nading hong ngen ding ahi hiam?
verses.4: Na sila ahi tawntung dingin nangma tungah thu hong ciam ding ahi hiam?
verses.5: Na nasem numeite na mawlpih bangin mawlpih zo dinga, vasa khawi bangin bawl zo ding na hi hiam?
verses.6: Ngasa bengte in lei dingin hong deek dinga, sa zuakte in zuak dingin a sa sem ding ahi hiam?
verses.7: Ngasa khawhna teipi tawh a vun khawh let zo dinga, teipi lingnei tawh a lutang khawh let zo ding na hi hiam?
verses.8: Khat vei su kha khin lecin na hihkik nawn kei dinga, tua na sukkhakna thu na mangngilh nawn kei ding hi.
verses.9: “Awle a mu mi peuhmah lau-in lei ah a puk uh hi.
verses.10: Awle a heh ciangin kihtakhuai mahmah a, ama omna mai ah kuamah om ngam lo hi.
verses.11: Leitung a om mihingte lakah Awle a suk manin a sih lawh lo kua om ahi hiam?
verses.12: “Awle khete, a guh a taang, a thahatna ziate gen loin ka om thei kei hi.
verses.13: Kua in ama puan tungnung hawk khiatsak zo a, a sik puanpi sun let zo ahi hiam?
verses.14: A kihtakhuai a hate a kam sungah om ahih manin, kua in ama kam phensak ngam ahi hiam?
verses.15: A nung zang suk ah a lipte lum bangin kithuap suk cinten a, suang bangin sakin kimatcip bikbek ciat hi.
verses.16: Tua lipte khatlekhat kithuapcip bikbek ahih manin, khatlekhat kikalah huih nangawn thawl zo lo hi.
verses.17: Tuate kinak mat lua ahih manin, bangmah in phel khia zo lo hi.
verses.18: Amah a hetchiai ciangin mei-ek bangin taang zaizai a, a mittangte nisuak bangin a taang hi.
verses.19: A kam panin mei kuang khia a, mei-ek leeng khia zaizai hi.
verses.20: A nak panin meikhu suak a, selkeu khu tawh kibang hi.
verses.21: Ama husanna in mei tawhkuang a, ama kam panin meikuang a suak khia hi.
verses.22: A ngawng zong thakhauh mahmah ahih manin, a gim thei het lo thatang a nei ahi hi.
verses.23: A vun tung khempeuh a nipna mun mahmah om lo a, sik peek bangin a sak kim hi.
verses.24: A lungsim in suangtum bangin kihtak khat zong nei lo a, an gawina suang bangin sakin do lah nei lo hi.
verses.25: Amah hong kithawi ciangin mi thahat pente nangawn lau a, kihta mahmah uh ahih manin cih nading thei loin a om uh hi.
verses.26: Namsau tawh a kisut hangin bun zo vet lo a, teipi le thaltangte in zong bun zo tuan het lo hi.
verses.27: Ama adingin sikte, buhkung bangin nip a, sumngote nangawn sing muat sa bang lel hi.
verses.28: Amah khua a phawksak zo ding, thaltang om lo a, suang tawh a kiden ciangin anvai them tu bang lel hi.
verses.29: Ama adingin molhtum pen buhkung bang hi lel a, teipi tawh a kikhawh ciangin a nuihsan lel hi.
verses.30: A khecinte, beelpei kitamte tawh kibang a, lam a pai ciangin leilak kuikek gawp hi.
verses.31: Amah in tuipi tokin beel sunga tui so bangsak zo a, sathau sa sunga tui tu bangin tuipi phuansak zaizai zo hi.
verses.32: A paina sa khempeuh ah tuihual om dandan a, tuipi phuansak pheuphau hi.
verses.33: Amah tehpih theih ding leitungah bangmah om lo a, bangmah kihtak a nei het lo ganhing ahi hi.
verses.34: Amah in a kihtakhuai ganhing a kihisak pente nangawn nuai-et lai a, amah pen gamsa khempeuhʼ kumpi ahi hi,” a ci hi.
